page.title: DeadAir Dynamic War T Files

page.t: (Messages - all factions referred to are singular)
%1 has greatly improved relations with %2. They are considered friendly.\(%3\)
%1 has greatly improved relations with %2. They are considered allies.\(%3\)
%1 has greatly improved relations with %2. They are considered close allies.\(%3\)
%1 has greatly improved relations with %2. They are now at peace and considered friendly.\(%3\)

%1 has greatly improved relations with %2. They are now at peace and considered close allies.\(%3\)
%1 has improved relations with %2. They are enemies.\(%3\)
%1 has improved relations with %2. They are at war.\(%3\)
%1 has improved relations with %2. They are at all-out war.\(%3\)

(flavor text - all factions referred to are singular)
Completion of a non-aggression pact has led to improved relations between %1 and %2.
Completion of a joint resources expedition has led to improved relations between %1 and %2.
Completion of a major trade deal between %1 and %2 has led to peace.
After wide scale protests crying for peace, %1 and %2 have signed a peace treaty.
After a near disasterous fight with the Xenon. %1 sent ships to save the fleet of %2. The two factions decided to settle their differences.
Reduced hostilities between %1 and %2 has greatly improved relations.
Reduced espionage between %1 and %2 has greatly improved relations.
Increased trade between %1 and %2 has slightly improved relations.
Increased tourism between %1 and %2 has slightly improved relations.
After a public request by Jack the Stripper, famous highway architect, %1 and %2 have ended their war.
An armistice treaty signed by %1 and %2. Prisoners have been exchanged and there is a fragile peace for now.
Reduced hostilities between %1 and %2 has slighty improved relations.
Reduced espionage between %1 and %2 has slightly improved relations.
Reduced trade between %1 and %2 has slightly worsened relations.
Reduced tourism between %1 and %2 has slightly worsened relations.
Increased hostilities between %1 and %2 has slightly worsened relations.
Increased espionage between %1 and %2 has slightly worsened relations.
Citing previous border disputes, %1 has declared war on %2 to protect their galactic sovereignty.
After a failed non-aggression pact, the relations between %1 and %2 have deteriorated into a minor conflict.
Reduced trade between %1 and %2 has greatly worsened relations.
Reduced tourism between %1 and %2 has greatly worsened relations.
A prominent leader of %1 has declared to build a wall blocking %2 and to make them pay for it. Relations have greatly worsened.
A prominent leader of %1 has called for the destruction of %2 during a state of the union address. Relations have greatly worsened.
A ship carrying water to a station experiencing a critical shortage was destroyed by %2 extremeists. %1 has declared war in retaliation.
An ambassador of %1 was assasinated. Evidence points to a deep-cover agent of %2 coalition. War has erupted.
A new captain of %2 fired upon a luxury passenger ship belonging to %1 coalition, thought to be smuggling criminals. %1 swiftly declared war.
A rogue faction logic AI designed by Mysterial has caused phantom fleet orders to invade %2 space. %1 has immediately declared all out war.
